original: @217a # // rgya gar skad du /🔽au pa de shanta ra:/
analyzed: @217a # // rgya gar skad du / au pa de shanta ra:/

original: hr'i: yig myos pa'i 'dab ma nye ba'i bcud rnams 'dzag par gyur pa'i lce dag dang yang ni //
analyzed: hr'i: yig myos pa'i 'dab ma nye ba'i bcud rnams 'dzag par gyur pa'i lce dag dang yang ni //
translated: The syllable HRĪḤ, with tongues that drip the essence of the intoxicated lotus,

original: de nyid blo gros skyed par byed pa la ni snying gi dbus nyid du ni bya ba yin //
analyzed: de nyid blo gros skyed par byed pa la ni snying gi dbus nyid du ni bya ba yin //
translated: and also in the center of the heart for the sake of generating that very wisdom.

original: de nyid mthong du zil gnon dug 'joms byad pa chos kyi yi ge rang nyid 'bab pa ste //
analyzed: de nyid mthong du zil gnon dug 'joms byad pa chos kyi yi ge rang nyid 'bab pa ste //
translated: That very thing, the conqueror of the poison of seeing, the self-falling letter of Dharma,

original: sgrol ma'i snying po 'di ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal byed shes bya snying rje'i zhing rnams kyis //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i snying po 'di ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal byed shes bya snying rje'i zhing rnams kyis //
translated: this essence of Tārā, the conqueror of the three realms, is known by the fields of compassion.

original: gdams ngag gi khyad par aa bha ya las tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: gdams ngag gi khyad par aa bha ya las tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: The Special Instructions was translated by Śīlapāl[aditya] from Abhayākara.
